   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

.. _`pcs_api`:

Projects API
############

PowerScript is the development environment of the system,
which enables you to develop add ons, user exits, stand alone scripts or
complex applications based on or integrated with the  |cs.platform|. This document
only describes some API members that are important for the ``cs.pcs`` package.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   project
   task
   mspxml_interface

==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
